name: Kedama‘s farm (仮) demo
description:
It was a normal day in Gensokyo,until some genso maidens disappear ......
Well , as it happened outside the human viliage ,not all residents know what happened ......
So did she , the one living in a farm near the human viliage......
She is a kedama magician , learning magic and use them with the help of kedamas ......
The story began when she found out some of the kedame is missing ......

tips: use chain skills
